p: Overall, there were four treatments with three replicates per treatment giving a total of 12 pots in a randomized block design: (i) inoculated pots with oil added (+AMF, +OIL), (ii) inoculated pots without oil (+AMF, −OIL), (iii) non-inoculated pots with oil added (−AMF, +OIL) and (iv) non-inoculated pots without oil (−AMF, −OIL; control). The second destructive sampling was conducted four weeks after the first essential oil application (Experiment 2).
